question: 丁目
sourceMnemonic: A <kanji>street</kanji> you can see with your <kanji>eye</kanji> isn't soooo big you can't see it (like a town would be), but it's still pretty big because it has a street. This section of the town is the <vocabulary>district of a town</vocabulary>, or a <vocabulary>city block</vocabulary> (though specifically one of an irregular size).
sourceReadingMnemonic: The readings are the ones you learned with the kanji, so use those and you'll be A-Okay.
